attributes.title: AIDS🍊🦋✨🙈💫🧚🏻
attributes.review: Omg I got aids from this man. He did things to me now I have aids. Cmon man your thing was so small I would at least like a medium. Jesus Christ man just cut it off. I feel bad for your wife for dealing with a fat orange Cheeto in the kitchen. Just stop with your ads too bc they are not true you uncultured orange orangutan. Dr Phil send him to the ranch. attributes.title: Kept crashing - disgusting customer service
attributes.review: Poor layout and format of application.  Outdated and quite frankly, lame function of the software.  I called the IT store for it and he coughed up flem during the whole conversation.  Definitely not giving my vote out to this crap!

attributes.title: 🙈🥰horrible app🧚🏻✨
attributes.review: tik tok told me it would be a good idea to download this app so we could learn a little something about our fellow 🟠 orange 🟠looking president 🙈! I learned a little bit about him! ✨ he is racist 🙈! And veryyy crazy 🙈the only good idea he has had is .......umm.....he has no good idea 😂well bye oh and btw came here from🙈

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of learning about trumps campaign for the upcoming election, only to have the app crash phone multiple times. The one time I got the app to stay open, I was able to find nothing useful within it. Waste of time!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: THIS APP BAD!! This app deserves all its bad ratings. It continued to make my phone crash anytime I opened the app before the third time where it shut down my phone all together. We had to bring my phone to the shop so they can connect it and delete the app manually.

attributes.title: Ruined my brand new phone
attributes.review: Literally got a new phone and downloaded this app. Not only did the app not even open without crashing, but now my phone keeps freaking out and Apple didn’t even know how to fix it. Absolutely outraged. Trump owes me a phone now.

attributes.title: This app is why she left me
attributes.review:
I had been dating my girlfriend for 55 years and we were just about to get married (we haven’t had premarital s3x yet) and when she found out I had this app she left me... and she took the kids too.
Karen if ur reading this pls come back

attributes.title: Completely Unsatisfactory
attributes.review: The moment I opened this app, I was disgusted and disappointed. The app as a whole is just hideous to look at, and downloading it just kept making my phone crash. There is nothing good to say about the app or my experience with it!

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: I tried to go through the different features of the app and anytime i would the app would crash. Also, the layout of the home page is very confusing. The colors and theme of the entire app is not appealing.

attributes.title: Crap
attributes.review: This app is trash I would definitely rather keep TikTok cause at least that way we have something to do cause he wants to keep being stupid and making the coronavirus worse with the dumb rallies like come on use your brain do you got one.
